sn55.25:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saranani sakko kalankato hoti.
sn55.25:1.5: Tatra sudam sambahula sakka sangamma samagamma ujjhayanti khiyanti vipacenti:
sn55.25:1.7: Ettha dani ko na sotapanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:1.8: Yatra hi nama saranani sakko kalankato.
sn55.25:1.12: Atha kho mahanamo sakko yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho mahanamo sakko bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn55.25:2.4: Tatra sudam, bhante, sambahula sakka sangamma samagamma ujjhayanti khiyanti vipacenti:
sn55.25:2.6: Ettha dani ko na sotapanno bhavissati.
sn55.25:2.7: Yatra hi nama saranani sakko kalankato.
sn55.25:3.1: “Yo so, mahanama, digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato, so katham vinipatam gaccheyya.
sn55.25:3.2: Yanhi tam, mahanama, samma vadamano vadeyya:
sn55.25:3.3: ‘digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato’, sarananim sakkam samma vadamano vadeyya.
sn55.25:3.4: Saranani, mahanama, sakko digharattam upasako buddham saranam gato dhammam saranam gato sangham saranam gato, so katham vinipatam gaccheyya.
sn55.25:4.1: Idha, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:4.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.25:4.6: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
sn55.25:4.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.25:5.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:5.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.25:5.5: hasapanno javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.25:5.6: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti, upahaccaparinibbayi hoti, asankharaparinibbayi hoti, sasankharaparinibbayi hoti, uddhamsoto hoti akanitthagami.
sn55.25:5.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.25:6.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:6.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.25:6.5: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.25:6.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagami hoti, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karoti.
sn55.25:6.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.25:7.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno—
sn55.25:7.2: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.25:7.5: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato.
sn55.25:7.6: So tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.25:7.7: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo parimutto niraya parimutto tiracchanayoniya parimutto pettivisaya parimutto apayaduggativinipata.
sn55.25:8.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …pe…
sn55.25:8.4: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato;
sn55.25:8.7: Tathagatappavedita cassa dhamma pannaya mattaso nijjhanam khamanti.
sn55.25:8.8: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo aganta nirayam aganta tiracchanayonim aganta pettivisayam aganta apayam duggatim vinipatam.
sn55.25:9.1: Idha pana, mahanama, ekacco puggalo na heva kho buddhe ekantagato hoti abhippasanno …
sn55.25:9.4: na hasapanno na javanapanno na ca vimuttiya samannagato;
sn55.25:9.8: Ayampi kho, mahanama, puggalo aganta nirayam aganta tiracchanayonim aganta pettivisayam aganta apayam duggatim vinipatam.
sn55.25:10.1: Seyyathapi, mahanama, dukkhettam dubbhumam avihatakhanukam, bijani cassu khandani putini vatatapahatani asaradani asukhasayitani, devo ca na samma dharam anuppaveccheyya.
sn55.25:10.2: Api nu tani bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:10.4: “Evameva kho, mahanama, idha dhammo durakkhato hoti duppavedito aniyyaniko anupasamasamvattaniko asammasambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:10.6: Tasminca dhamme savako viharati dhammanudhammappatipanno samicippatipanno anudhammacari—
sn55.25:11.1: Seyyathapi, mahanama, sukhettam subhumam suvihatakhanukam, bijani cassu akhandani aputini avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani;
sn55.25:11.3: Api nu tani bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyun”ti?
sn55.25:11.5: “Evameva kho, mahanama, idha dhammo svakkhato hoti suppavedito niyyaniko upasamasamvattaniko sammasambuddhappavedito—
sn55.25:11.7: Tasminca dhamme savako viharati dhammanudhammappatipanno samicippatipanno anudhammacari—
sn55.25:11.10: Saranani, mahanama, sakko maranakale sikkhaya paripurakari ahosi”ti.
